Date:
Create a new TA by yourself, use the following conf files:

props.conf:

[nessus1]

REPORT-222auto_kv_for_nessus = auto_kv_for_nessus1
FIELDALIAS-nessus_bugtraq1 = f1 AS m1
FIELDALIAS-nessus_bugtraq2 = f2 AS f3
 
transform.conf:
[auto_kv_for_nessus1]
DELIMS = ","
FIELDS = f1, f2, f3
